Open the Messages application to access the messaging interface.
Click the back arrow to return to the previous screen.
Click "Settings" to access the application's settings menu.
Scroll down within the Settings menu to reveal additional options like "Help improve Messages" and "About, terms & privacy".
Click on "Spam protection" to access its settings.
Enable spam protection by clicking the toggle switch.
Navigate back to the "Settings" menu from the "Spam protection" screen.
